titleStmt.title: The man of sin discovered whom the Lord shall destroy with the brightnesse of his coming : the root and foundation of antichrist laid open in doctrine / by Hen. Denne.
titleStmt.author: Denne, Henry, 1606 or 7-1660?

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
